response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer at a price that reflects its true worth and benefits to you. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, ensuring that you receive exceptional value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
